title: Indian automobile industry grows 19 pc to Rs 10.22 lakh cr in FY24: Report
description: In the two-wheeler segment, India witnessed 10 per cent increase in volume and 13 per cent in value. The three-wheeler segment grew by 16 per cent in volume and 24 per cent in value and the commercial vehicle segment rose by 3 per cent in volume and 7 per cent in value.
